GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.65
GSD.description:
mm/hugetlb: avoid corrupting page->mapping in hugetlb_mcopy_atomic_pte

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.65 by commit da60ddd80d09f8371fbba1a238a4b318d13ba698, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit f619147104c8ea71e120e4936d2b68ec11a1e527. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mm/hugetlb: avoid corrupting page->mapping in hugetlb_mcopy_atomic_pte
